abstract_summ: Since the first case of Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCov) was identified in December 2019 in Wuhan City, China, the number of cases continues to grow across China . The cumulative number of reported deaths is at 637 as of February 7, 2020 . We found that the latest estimates of the death risk could be as high as 20% in the epicenter of the epidemic whereas we estimate it ~1% in relatively mildly-affected areas .
